content.html: Test code is real code. It is deserving of love and attention, and should be AT LEAST as obvious and readable as the code it tests. Cleaning up a messy test is like giving a gift to future-you.
content.value:
Test code is real code.

It is deserving of love and attention, and should be AT LEAST as obvious and readable as the code it tests.

Cleaning up a messy test is like giving a gift to future-you.
